feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [LIM1][Dedicated Servers] - Switch maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 29, 00:00 - 02:00 UTC

Sep 19, 21:31 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 29/09/2022 00:00 UTC
End time : 29/09/2022 02:00 UTC
Service impact : Public network and vRack will be unavailable for 5 minutes
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a switch.

entry.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 46I26
entry.content:
Sep 19, 16:04 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 19/09/2022 14:57 UTC
End Time : 19/09/2022 15:54 UTC
Root cause : A network device was at fault.
Comment : Finally the network equipment is functional again after some reboot. All servers are back in service.

Sep 19, 15:42 UTC
Identified - Update : A network equipment is faulty, our teams will replace it.

Sep 19, 15:13 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 19/09/2022 14:57 UTC
Service impact : All servers on rack 46I26 are unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are in the process of identifying the cause of the downtime.
